name: Bullet Blaze
description:
In Bullet Blaze, players take on the role of a heroic warrior with multiple bullet types, traversing obstacles and enemies, protecting peace and saving the world.

Your mission is to jump and run, dodging enemy attacks and obstacles, while also using a wide variety of bullet types to defeat your enemies. There are six different bullet types in the game, each with a different firing speed and frequency. Upgrade your weapons by defeating enemies and collecting coins to make defeating enemies easier in future levels.

There are also many interesting props to collect in the game, such as explosives, which can destroy your enemies and make you escape from their pursuit. Also, you can collect coins to unlock new characters.

The game interface is simple and easy to understand, and the operation is simple and smooth. Bullet Blaze offers an exciting gaming experience, giving players a great shooting game experience. Hurry up to download and experience it!
